data.title: Saga Run Report
data.bodyText:
# Auto Saga Report

- sagaKey: `uc-30-the-solo-entrepreneur-sarah`
- runId: `saga_run_3A7eP5cRTfQYqObDSIb8eiN579s`
- generatedAt: `2026-02-24T15:46:54.957Z`

All lifecycle steps were executed by the API-only auto runner.

data.title: Owner validates financial/reporting outputs API Trace

data.instruction: Upload snapshots for critical steps and submit final markdown report summarizing pass/fail and discovered gaps.
data.expectedResult: Run has persisted report + snapshots in project directory and indexed metadata in DB.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Multi-Timezone Coordination. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Read reporting endpoints and verify booking totals, counts, and statuses align with saga actions.
data.expectedResult: Reported metrics match booking actions and highlight any discrepancies for schema/API iteration.

data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.
